definition: a brass musical instrument with a brilliant tone, proclaim or announce with or as if with a fanfare
details:
noun
- a brass musical instrument with a brilliant tone
= synonyms: horn
- (card games) the suit that has been declared to rank above all other suits for the duration of the hand
= example: (card games) the suit that has been declared to rank above all other suits for the duration of the hand
- a playing card in the suit that has been declared trumps
= example: a playing card in the suit that has been declared trumps
= synonyms: trump card
verb
- proclaim or announce with or as if with a fanfare
= synonyms: trump out
- play a trump
= synonyms: ruff
- get the better of
= synonyms: best
- produce a sound as if from a trumpet
